name: Lucas Schaat
quote: Don't ever, for any reason, do anything to anyone for any reason ever, no matter what, no matter where, or who, or who you are with, or where you are going, or where you've been... ever, for any reason whatsoever...

name: Rob Knowles
quote: Be excellent to each other... party on dudes!

name: Spongebob Squarepants
quote: Well, it's no secret that the best thing about a secret is secretly telling someone your secret, thereby adding another secret to their secret collection of secrets, secretly.

name: Sandy Cheeks
quote: Stupidity isn't a virus... but it sure is spreading like one.

name: Patrick Star
quote: You know: I wumbo, you wumbo, he, she, me... wumbo... wumboing, wumbology: the study of wumbo. It's first grade, Spongebob!

name: Sheldon J. Plankton
quote: That's it mister, YOU JUST LOST YOUR BRAIN PRIVILEGES!
